text: Chris met Anna while working at C.H.S.
Anna fell in love with Chris, but he was not ready to believe that.
Anna wanted Chris to visit her in Toronto, but I did not... at first.
Anna came to Ottawa to visit Chris, but she started to think he was selfish.
Anna wanted to be with Chris, but Chris was not ready to be with her.
When Chris was ready to be with her, she did not want to be with him, it seemed.
Anna inspired Chris to paint, to sing, and perform.
Anna is great, but experiences emotions extremely.
alternative: Anna is volitile, and she can change from your best friend into you enemy by the flip of a coin.

text: Chris later visited Anna in Toronto, but he came on too strong, and scared her away.
alternative: Anna had her own issues, and at that time she was not able to handle her emotions let along a relationship.

text: Chris visited Anna for several months in 2022, but she was not ready to be with him.
alternative: Chris visited Anna for several months in 2022, by the midpoint she wanted to be with him but Chris had stopped believing.

text: Chris thought he had to show her that he could move on, but that was not right.
alternative: Chris escaped into his mind to deal with his pain.

text: Chris tried to help Anna, but he went about it wrong.
alternative: Chris tried to help Anna, but he went about it wrong.

text: Chris spent money he didn't have, and lost her respect.
alternative: Chris spent money he didn't have, and lost her respect.

text: Chris told a joke at work that was offensive, and she reported him.
alternative: Chris told an offensive joke at work, and Chris wrongly believed that Anna reporte him.

text: Their timing was not right, though Chris still pines for Anna.
Anna inspired him to paint his deep emotions that he felt for her.
Chris wanted her so badly, so muuch so that he didn't see that she wanted me.
alternative: Chris became obsessive, embarressed her at work, and she started to believe that he only cared about himself.

text: Anna can be erratic.
Anna is a great manager.
Chris felt like Anna took my promotion, but she did not.
Chris' obsession, and ego sabotaged my career at C.H.S., but he blamed her, and it haunts him.
